name: Anix Lynch
title: Data Engineer | ML Engineer | Business Analyst

summary.japanese_first: Trilingual (Japanese/English/Thai) business executive with MBA from Chicago Booth and 20+ years of experience spanning venture capital, finance, and data-driven operations. Native-level Japanese (JLPT N1) with 16 years living/working in Japan. Currently building AI/ML portfolio (ZeroShot.dev) while seeking remote US opportunities leveraging bilingual expertise. Track record managing $2B+ in PE/VC deals, leading cross-border teams, and driving strategic initiatives across Asia-Pacific markets.
summary.business_first: MBA-educated investment professional with 20+ years of experience managing $2B+ in PE/VC transactions and leading strategic initiatives across Asia-Pacific markets. Former Managing Partner at Expara (SEA early-stage VC) and VP at MQDC ($1.5B+ real estate portfolio). Recognized as 'Top Female VC in Thailand' and guest lecturer at Chicago Booth MBA. Proven track record in fund formation, deal sourcing, portfolio management, and ecosystem building. Currently transitioning into data-driven roles, building AI/ML engineering portfolio (ZeroShot.dev).
summary.tech_first: Data and AI engineering professional with MBA from Chicago Booth, building production-ready AI/ML systems through ZeroShot.dev portfolio (5 interoperable projects: Resume MCP, AWS/GCP pipelines, LangChain agents). 20+ years of business experience providing deep domain expertise in finance, real estate, and venture capital. Tech stack: Python, SQL, TensorFlow, PyTorch, LangChain, dbt, Airflow, AWS, GCP, Docker. Seeking to leverage unique combination of technical skills and business acumen in data analyst, ML engineer, or AI engineering roles.

education.institution: University of Chicago Booth School of Business

certifications: Meta Data Analyst Professional Certificate (Credly verified)

experience.company: ZeroShot.dev - Personal AI Data Engineering Suite
experience.description: Building 5 production-ready interoperable AI/ML systems (30% complete)
highlights: Resume MCP: Built AI job-matching API using TensorFlow, PyTorch, HuggingFace. Embedded 1,000+ job postings with MLflow experiment tracking. Deployed on AWS SageMaker/GCP Vertex AI + Flask API via ngrok.
Mocktailverse (AWS): Architected serverless ETL pipeline with Airflow, dbt, Glue, Lambda. Orchestrated S3 → Glue/Lambda → DynamoDB → dbt modeling.
Cocktailverse (GCP): Built scalable pipeline with Apache Beam, Dataflow, BigQuery. GCS → Cloud Functions → Dataflow → BigQuery transformations.
Dynamic Resume Agent: Created RAG-powered agent with LangChain consuming Resume MCP API. Streamlit dashboard for job-match visualization.
Marketing Analytics: Full-stack ETL with dbt, Airflow, DuckDB, Vertex AI predictive modeling. Streamlit dashboard with Plotly for KPI visualization.
DevOps: Docker, Git, GitHub Actions, CI/CD automation across all projects. Total cost: <$50 (AWS free tier + GCP $300 credits).

experience.description: Led sovereign wealth VC fund backed by Government Savings Bank, managing $20M+ AUM
highlights: Fund Operations: Managed end-to-end deal flow, sourced 700+ deals/year, closed $5M+ investments. Lead investor/board director: Ooca, Event Banana, Peak Engine, One Stockhome.
Portfolio: Fintech, DeepTech, AI, HealthTech, Blockchain, EdTech, PropTech. Exits: 2C2P (acquired), Co-asset (acquired).
Team Leadership: Managed 3 FT associates, 6 vendors, 8 accelerator partnerships, 40+ VC network.
Strategic Initiatives: Created 'Techsauce FAB' (Food/Agri/Biotech) flagship program, grew audience 10K→15K. Built community of 500+ startups in future-tech sectors.
Fund Formation: Structured fund with Government Savings Bank and Stock Exchange of Thailand. Developed screening criteria, cap table structures, waterfall analysis, portfolio construction.
Public Profile: Named 'Top Female VC in Thailand'. Guest lecturer: Chicago Booth MBA, Sasin MBA. 20+ keynote speeches. TV commentator: LINE TV 'Startup Star 4.0', True Television.
achievements: Managed $2B+ in PE/VC transactions over 20 years

highlights: Policy Development: Initiated 'Bangkok Beta' plan (2014), adopted as national 'Thailand 4.0' strategy. Synthesized comprehensive policy framework for Ministry of ICT, Ministry of Science.
Budget Planning: Estimated $395M budget to produce 1-5 tech unicorns in 8 years.
Research: Conducted 26 Silicon Valley research trips: Google, Facebook, Uber, Airbnb, Khosla, 500 Startups.
Impact Delivered (2015-2018): 17 of 26 policy recommendations implemented within 3 years. 'One Stop Shop' & 'Smart Visa' approved by BOI. VC/startup tax waivers introduced for first time.
Economic Impact: Government allocated $560M to support 10,000 startups ($160M over initial proposal). Thailand's 'Ease of Doing Business' improved 3 points (World Bank ranking).
Recognition: Recognized by True Corporation as 'Tech Ecosystem Alliance' at True Digital Park launch.
achievements: Secured $560M government funding for startup ecosystem
Predicted Thai new economy trends 2015-2020 with 90%+ accuracy

career_narrative.gap_explanation: After 20 years in finance and venture capital, I recognized AI was transforming every industry. Rather than becoming obsolete, I chose to become AI-proof. I spent 2019-2024 transitioning from investment professional to AI engineer, building production-ready systems through ZeroShot.dev. Now I'm seeking to combine my deep business expertise with my new technical skills - offering both the domain knowledge of a 20-year veteran AND the technical capabilities of a modern data/AI engineer. This unique combination is rare and valuable.
career_narrative.unique_value_proposition: Unique combination of 20+ years business/finance expertise + modern AI/ML engineering skills + trilingual capabilities (EN/JP/TH) + MBA from Chicago Booth. Can bridge technical and business stakeholders, understand both code and cap tables, and operate across cultures.
